CSSFilter-functionHue-rotate.summary: The hue-rotate() CSS function rotates the hue of an element and its contents. Its result is a {{cssxref("<filter-function>")}}.

remarks.para:
-CSS filter effects module
-The other {{cssxref("<filter-function>")}} functions available to be used in values of the filter and backdrop-filter properties include:-filter-function/blur
-filter-function/brightness
-filter-function/contrast
-filter-function/drop-shadow
-filter-function/grayscale
-filter-function/invert
-filter-function/opacity
-filter-function/saturate
-filter-function/sepia
